goku.name: Goku
goku.bio: A Saiyan warrior who protects Earth and strives to become the strongest fighter.

vegeta.name: Vegeta
vegeta.bio: The Saiyan prince who is proud, determined, and always looking to surpass Goku.

freiza.name: Frieza
freiza.bio: A tyrannical ruler of the universe who seeks immortality and ultimate power.

piccolo.name: Piccolo
piccolo.bio: A wise and powerful Namekian who is a mentor to Gohan and a protector of Earth.

gohan.name: Gohan
gohan.bio: Goku's eldest son who combines intelligence with incredible fighting potential.
